member.name: IMFMediaEngineNotify.EventNotify
member.summary: Notifies the application when a playback event occurs.
member.param: A member of the enumeration that specifies the event.
The first event parameter. The meaning of this parameter depends on the event code.
The second event parameter. The meaning of this parameter depends on the event code.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
